summary: This is a Law360 New York newsletter from July 31, 2019, summarizing multiple legal news stories. One section reports that an alleged Jeffrey Epstein victim claims Michael Cemovich and Alan Dershowitz are using legal fees to intimidate her in a Second Circuit appeal, prompting Cemovich to apologize and distance himself from Dershowitz.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose alleged victim is involved in a legal dispute with Michael Cemovich and Alan Dershowitz.

persons.name: Michael Cemovich
persons.context: Requested to compel an alleged Epstein victim to pay costs in a Second Circuit appeal; later apologized and distanced himself from Alan Dershowitz after accusations of intimidation.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Accused, along with Michael Cemovich, of attempting to intimidate an alleged Jeffrey Epstein victim through a request for legal fees in an appeal.

connections.description: Both were accused by an alleged Epstein victim of collaborating to intimidate her through a motion for costs; Cemovich later apologized and distanced himself from Dershowitz.
Dershowitz is involved in a legal dispute with an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein, accused of using legal tactics to intimidate her.
Cemovich is involved in a legal appeal concerning an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Accuser Alleges Intimidation by Cemovich and Dershowitz
events.description: An alleged Jeffrey Epstein victim claims in a legal motion that Michael Cemovich's request to compel her to pay costs in a Second Circuit appeal is an attempt by Cemovich and Alan Dershowitz to intimidate her.

keyFacts: An alleged Jeffrey Epstein victim accused Michael Cemovich and Alan Dershowitz of using a motion for legal costs to intimidate her in a Second Circuit appeal.
Michael Cemovich apologized and distanced himself from Alan Dershowitz following the intimidation allegations.
The document is a legal industry newsletter highlighting this case among many other unrelated legal news stories.
